name: Post-Apo Builder: Prologue
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1505940/Orc_Warchief_Strategy_City_Builder/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1442450/Monsters_Domain/

It's time to learn about the dangers of the wasteland. You've trained all your life to be one of the captains.
The council of elders has given you your first serious assignment. You must lead your people through the wastelands.
For the first time, you get access to 3rd level of technology. Which gives you access to vehicles, allows you to explore further terrain.
You need to prepare the necessary equipment and resoruces.
The wasteland awaits.



Restore civilization on the ashes of the fallen world!

Scavenge and gather for resources, everything counts!

Build and manage city of survivors after a apocalypse. Take care of every aspect of life. Gather, build, farm, upgrade, win !

Explore wastelands to gather resources, protect and take care of your people!

Fight off raiders, wild tribesman and natural disasters.
